title: Exceptional Norris Square Home!
description: The one you’ve been waiting for! Exceptional Norris Square location and 16’ of frontage provides sprawling, light-filled design with over 2400 square feet of total living space. Exceptional quality, stunning selections, and an expansive roof deck with panoramic views that will leave you speechless! Arresting curb appeal with sleek aluminum, timeless brick, oversized windows. Wide-open main-floor living area with porcelain entryway, superb natural light, wide-plank white oak floors. Generous powder room with chic matte-black fixtures. Dream kitchen with timeless shaker cabinetry, matte-black hardware, Carrera herringbone backsplash, quartz surfaces, stainless appliances including French-door refrigerator with in-door dispenser, large work island with deep undermount sink, sophisticated brushed gold pendants. Step out to large, fenced patio. Sprawling owner’s sanctuary with oversized picture window for fantastic natural light, massive walk-in closet, wet bar with wine fridge. Spa-like owner’s bath with frameless glass walk-in shower, oversized floor-to-ceiling porcelain tile with river rock inlay, rainfall shower head, double-bowl vanity, handsome porcelain tile floors. Generous guest bedrooms with abundant natural light, sumptuous guest bathroom with soaktub/shower, porcelain tile surround, waterfall glass tile inlay. Fabulous, sprawling roof deck with commanding views of both the skyline and bridges. Finished basement with possible 4th bedroom and full bath adds nearly 700 additional square feet of rec/flex space. This one checks off every box! Shows beautifully!

title: Tired of roommates? Quiet place near Cherokee and West Hortter
description:
GENERAL DESCRIPTION:
Quiet junior one bedroom apartment in Mt. Airy, Pelham neighborhood, can be rented furnished or unfurnished.

Only 1/2 mile from Wissahickon Valley Park this rare opening, available 4/18/23, is in a Victorian twin converted into 3 apartments. The owners live and work on premise. This is a cozy bright 3rd floor apartment, with a private entrance.
We keep a pesticide and smoke free building.
APARTMENT FEATURES:
It is a clean and bright 2 room + bath unit (living room/kitchen combo + the bedroom + full bath). The bathroom/kitchen have not yet been used after being newly renovated. It includes a shower/tub perfect for soaking after biking or hiking in Wissahickon Park.
Laundry is free and is just steps away in the basement. The newly re-built kitchen area has been converted to include an induction burner cooktop, and electric turbo oven. Clean hardwood floors, with two woolen oriental rugs included if choosing the furnished option.
LOCATION:
Located in a quiet building in a desirable residential location, it is within 1/2 mile of food markets, library, houses of worship, and other amenities found near Lincoln Drive, Weavers Way co-op, and along the Germantown Ave. commercial corridor. Super easy access to Chestnut Hill and Germantown. If you value using public transit and have a car, you have many choices. Septa Station Chestnut Hill West Line, Upsal and Carpenter trains are a 2 block walk. Chestnut East Line is one mile away. Buses run on Germantown Ave 2 blocks nearby.  On-street parking is easily available.
RENT:
Base rent unfurnished is $945./month, landlord pays for water, sewer, trash, runoff tax, and heat. Tenant pays electric, obtains secure wifi. A/C window units provided and installed by landlord as needed.
1st month rent, last month rent, and refundable* security deposit needed to move in (*refund provided during joint inspection on last day of tenancy) $2835
$2,835 required to move in along with proof of ability to afford monthly rent and presentation of recent credit report. Priced low to cast a wide net to find the right person who loves the community as much as we do. We are open to considering sabbatical stay, student, or 12 month lease options, along with furnished or unfurnished options.
Convenient to  Mt. Airy, Chestnut Hill, Roxboro, East Falls, Glenside, and other nearby neighborhoods. Convenient to many universities, colleges, and rabbinical schools in the Philadelphia area.

title: Absolutely Gorgeous 3 Bedroom 1 1/2 Bath Townhouse For Rent!
description: For rent in desirable Lindenfeild neighborhood, is this polished and updated 3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome located on a cul de sac lane. The home is practically next door to North Branch Park and Chestnut Street Park! There are walking trails and 3 playgrounds to get that breathe of fresh air every day. The home boasts a bright kitchen with granite countertops, elegant tile backsplash, smart lighting, recessed lights, stainless steel appliances, and direct access to the large deck. The kitchen is open to the dining room area which flows nicely into the living room. All luxury vinal planking flooring on the first floor and neutral paint. A powder room bathroom completes this floor. Upstairs there are 3 bedrooms a bathroom and access to the attic for additional storage space. Each bedroom has a ceiling fan, large closets, recessed lights and beautiful hardwood floors. The main bedroom has 3 large closets. The bathroom is a jack-n-jill style with access from the hallway or the main bedroom. The full bathroom has double sinks, tiled tub/shower surround, curved shower rod, large shower head and ceramic flooring. Here you’ll find the easy access to the washer and dryer as well. Enjoy the spring, summer and fall seasons outside on the deck with natural privacy on 2 sides and fence panels on the other. For additional storage, there’s a tall garden shed on the deck. Flower beds add to the warmth of this home at both the front and the back of the house. The HOA community takes care of the lawn and common areas as well as the snow plowing. Close to Chalfont and Doylestown stores, shops, restaurants, parks, museums and Lake Galena at Peace Valley Park. Septa’s regional rail Chalfont Station is 1 mile from this home. This is a no pet, no smoking property.

title: 4 Bedroom,One Bathroom, Back Yard
description:
This energy efficient brick townhouse has a foyer to reduce heat loss, a well insulated attic and heated houses on either side to minimize heating and air conditioning bills.
The first floor has a generous living room featuring random width long-leaf yellow pine floors, a marble fireplace (non functional) and floor to ceiling built-in bookshelves. Next to the living room is a formal dining room with a coat closet and shelves for dishes. The kitchen has a ceramic tile floor, wood cabinets with a large butcher block counter top against a handsome exposed brick wall. The kitchen features a gas stove and sink with garbage disposal. The solid wood upper cabinets offer adequate storage. The kitchen leads to private brick paved rear courtyard with plantings. Another door leads down the stairs to a full unfinished basement for storage or workshop. In the basement there is a new, high efficiency gas heater/ air conditioning system and a gas clothes washer and dryer.
In the rear of the second floor is a large 10'x10' bathroom with a tub/ shower combination. There are two bedrooms on this floor that are carpeted. Each bedroom has a walk-in closet. The carpeted third floor also has two nice bedrooms.
This property is located in a great little neighborhood just 6 blocks from City Hall on a quiet, small street with good neighbors. It is within easy walking distance to Chinatown and the Reading Terminal Market. The 23 bus runs north and south at either end if the block. The Broad Street Subway is just two blocks west. It is a 5 minute walk to Philadelphia Community College, a 10 minute bike ride to Temple and 5 minute ride to the Academy of Fine Arts. Around the corner is the JUNO, The Institute Restaurant and Bar and Union Transfer entertainment venue. There are other restaurants nearby and small sundry stores as well as Target and CVS
Tenants responsible for all utilities, There is a monthly fee for a Cat

Live at Park Towne Place Apartment Homes in Center City Philadelphia, and you'll be blocks from the center of nightlife in Logan Square and Rittenhouse Square. Unit features modern kitchens, quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, in-unit washers and dryers, breakfast bars, pendant lighting, tile backsplashes, wood plank flooring throughout, walk-in closets. Stunning city and museum views are offered in a variety of floor plans! Mainstreet Market and Caf , featuring gourmet coffee and tea and much more! Fitness center with Technogym equipment, Queenax boxing gym, yoga/spin studio with indoor/outdoor workout space. It boasts Philadelphia's largest pools, an art studio, fitness center with boxing gym, yoga/spin studio, social lounge with demonstration kitchen, gourmet market and cafe, outdoor lounge with fire pit, 24-hour concierge, 24/7 package acceptance, resident shuttle service to Center City and University City and more. Make Whole Foods as your second kitchen conveniently located just 1 block away. Our apartments are within one mile of several institutions of higher education: Drexel University, Temple University, University of Penn, CHOP, Moore college of Arts, Community College of Philadelphia. You won't find a better building to live with amenities in the Fairmount Area. Park Towne Place includes 948 apartment and penthouse homes within four high-rise towers. The community is nestled between green acres on the Benjamin Franklin Parkway in the heart of Center City Philadelphia's Museum District. Park Town. ** Prices and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **
2200 Benjamin Franklin Pkwy #0B1BA

title: Beautiful tucked away community located in the heart of Bella Vista
description:
Welcome to Carriage Mews, a beautiful tucked away community located in the heart of Bella Vista and the Meredith School Catchment, offering 1-car garage parking and a quiet shared courtyard. This 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom, extra wide townhome has been nicely updated and maintained throughout the years. Enter directly through the garage to the first floor featuring an open kitchen and dining area, a large pantry, a conveniently located half bath and a coat closet. The updated kitchen with newer stainless-steel appliances, quartz countertops, a nicely tiled backsplash, gas cooking, and an island for additional storage and counterspace. The spacious dining room (could also double as additional living space) features a wood burning fireplace and glass siding doors overlooking the beautiful well-manicured courtyard. Up the stairs is an oversized living room with hardwood floors, built-in cabinets, a ceiling fan and a large storage closet. This floor also features two nicely sized bedrooms both with closets and great natural light, a laundry closet, and a full bathroom with a tub. Continue up to the beautiful primary bedroom with south facing sliding glass doors to the Juliette Balcony, a wall of closets and access to your private bathroom with a tub and stall shower. Off the bedroom is a bonus living space and additional closets, great for a home office, playroom or an additional lounging area. Lastly, exit out to the private deck with tree top views, perfect for relaxing with a good book. Many recent updates: new Anderson doors & noise cancelling windows (2019), HVAC (2021), washer & dryer (2017), kitchen appliances (2019), and more! Plenty of storage throughout the home as well as in the garage. Located on a quiet street just off Cianfrani Park. Quick walk to Whole Foods, ACME, the Italian Market and some of the city’s best restaurants. Immediate move-in available.
705-11 Pemberton St #711

title: Looking for a spacious modern home centrally located to center city
description:
Looking for a spacious modern home centrally located to center city and surrounding areas. Blocks away from award winning restaurants and theatres. This stunning 4 floor townhome with over 3,000 square feet of livable space offers an open concept great outdoor space with a patio off the kitchen and a deck off the hallway on 3rd floor, which gives an amazing view of the center city skyline. The interior of the home has 5 bedrooms , 4.5 bathrooms and finished basemen and 2 car garage with additional storage. The entrance to the home is accessed from a private walk -way off of 15th St. or from the garage . Step inside and you are greeted by luxurious amenities and stylish finishes . The foyer is nicely tiled with to the left is a full bedroom and bath , closet , entrance to basement and access to the garage. Walk up the stairs to the 2nd floor where you are greeted with an open floor plan of your main living space which consist of your living room, gourmet kitchen with beautiful black quartz counter tops and backsplash, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher , refrigerator ,walk-in pantry, formal dining room, powder room and patio. Head upstairs to the 3rd floor where you will find the master suite with an amazing walk- in closet 4 piece bathroom, soaking tub, stall shower, double vanity, dual flush toilet and two windows to take in the bright natural light of the sun. At the rear of the hallway sits bedroom #3. Head up to the 4th floor and you will find two more bedrooms and a hall bath, laundry room , storage space and deck that over looks the center city skyline. The basement is fully finished with full bathroom , very high ceilings, great for entertaining, gym or private living quarters. The two car garage has two entrances one leading directly into foyer and one that leads to basement. Truly a must see!
1426 Kenilworth St

title: Welcome to the Phoenix - Philadelphia's Premier Luxury Condominium
description:
Welcome to the Phoenix - Philadelphia's Premier Luxury Condominium. Located at 1600 Arch Street in the heart of Center City Philadelphia, Unit 1010 is an exceptional studio apartment with premium finishes and fixtures. The apartment contains a washer/dryer, dishwasher, ample pantry space, two closets, hardwood flooring, a high ceiling, and a modernized kitchen and bathroom. The Phoenix boasts a 24-hour concierge, valet parking, curated amenity space, including a state-of-the-art fitness center and weight room, a resident lounge with event space, a conference room, a bike storage room, and a spacious outdoor terrace with stunning views. Additional amenities include a full-service restaurant (Tir Na Nog Irish Bar and Grill), Starbucks, WSFS Bank, and a recently announced grab-and-go mart on the concourse level. The Phoenix is situated near some of the finest parks, restaurants, and shopping Philadelphia has to offer, with City Hall and Dilworth Park directly across the street. It is conveniently located with elevator access to Suburban Station and minutes from major thoroughfares I-95 and I-76. Tenant responsible for utilities. One-time move-in/move-out fee of $400. Valet parking and storage available for additional fees.
1600-18 Arch St #1010

title: Spacious, captivating Old City loft. Great space and scale in a covete
description: Spacious, captivating Old City loft. Great space and scale in a coveted "01" layout with rare private outdoor space. Original beamed ceilings, dramatic tall windows, exposed brick, fresh paint, and gleaming hardwood floors throughout. Enter into a long foyer lined with windows-there's plenty of space for bookcases or a home office here. The hallway opens into a wide open living and dining area, with room to spare for even the largest scale sofas and tables. Glass doors open to the private terrace, offering a quiet respite and great spot for coffee or cocktails above the street below. Contemporary open plan kitchen with light quartz counters, full suite of stainless appliances, and a breakfast bar with additional seating makes entertaining easy. 301 offers a balance of open loft and private space. The enclosed bedroom offers privacy for quiet nights, and there is plenty of adjacent square footage for a home office or to add an additional bedroom. Modern bathroom off the hallway with marble vanity. Large walk in closet with Bosch laundry. AC, basement storage, and a shared roof deck with panoramic views of bridge & city. Hard to find Old City charm and character, with a stellar location north of Market. Steps from restaurants, boutiques, coffee shops, gyms, & galleries.

title: In Philadelphia, albeit a big awesome city, and OLD, loft living isn t
description: In Philadelphia, albeit a big awesome city, and OLD, loft living isn t as abundant as we wish. Lofts are typically adaptive reuse of former industrial or manufacturing buildings converted to residential living. If/when you can find one of these oddities, they might be in former industrial sites, which don t usually occur in the center of residential neighbors, except in one instance, Memphis Flats. This original developers, Brown and Hill, are famous for creating luxury buildings in New York City and the most expensive and coveted residential hi-rise building in Philadelphia, The Ayre, former residence of once famous Philadelphia Philly, Chase Utley!  The property was subsequently used by Pepsi-Cola Bottling Company and Nabisco (from where it became affectionately known as the Popcorn Factory). Most recently owned by an automobile tire distributor, the buildings were left as an eyesore and the site a dangerous blight to the neighborhood.
